gwt.g3d.client.camera
Class BasicCamera

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g3d.client.camera.AbstractCamera
      gwt.g3d.client.camera.BasicCamera
All Implemented Interfaces:
Camera
public class BasicCamera
extends AbstractCamera

Represents a basic 3D camera with basic mouse rotation support. Adapted from the Camera class in by Computer Science Department, Cornell University.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com, Adam Arbree, Wenzel Jakob, Shuang Zhao
